FuncDef: This command configures the SRLG membership of an interface. The user can apply SRLGs to an IES, VPRN, network IP, or MPLS interface.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the group, up to 32 characters. The association of group name and value should be unique within an IP/MPLS domain. An interface can belong to up to 64 SRLG groups. Each single operation of the srlg-group command allows a maximum of 5 groups to be specified at a time.
